author: wn.com
title: Landmark 40th Edition of IHGF Delhi Fair breaks all records: attracts 7,300 buyers from 110 ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Textiles of the Republic of India ) Landmark 40th Edition of IHGF Delhi Fair breaks all records: attracts 7, 300 buyers from 110 countries Business enquiries worth Rs. 2700 crore have been generated as curtains drew today
